EmailTemplate.subject: New Honeywell surplus markdowns
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
If you haven’t had the opportunity to purchase new surplus parts from Honeywell on www.GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/]]>, please know that new markdowns have been applied to a large group of material across many platforms and applications.
The good news is that almost 10,000 part numbers are still available and are all eligible for an additional 50% off (use promo code BLACK at checkout on GoDirectTrade.com). For convenience, you can click here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/NI00PQ0G000M0yX0LZ0002q]]> to download the available parts list, including their prices.
Below is a preview illustrating the level of discounts available. Parts have been flying off the shelf so act fast—all of them are subject to prior sale. List Price Sale Price 9008000-10000 <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/honeywellaerospacetrading-pn-9008000-10000-ne.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Black]]> NXT-800 MODE B737NG, B777 $780,000 $94,788 extra 50% off sale price! SCD-90407879 <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/gdt-hat-2200-1000-scd-90407879-ne.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Black]]> Rockwell Collins ICS-300 Iridium Coms $654,862 $109,144 extra 50% off sale price! 7517400-877 <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/honeywellaerospacetrading-pn-7517400-877-ne.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Black]]> MODULE ASSEMBLY, E170/190 $109,283 $57,600 extra 50% off sale price! SHOP HONEYWELL NEW SURPLUS NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/discount.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Black]]> Best regards,
Keith Doty Director of Operations GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Black]]>
